About Me

Hi! I’m Peter! I’m a software engineer who has passion for building clean web applications with intuitive functionality. I enjoy the process of turning ideas into reality using creative solutions, and making things that have real life impact on peoples’ lives. I mainly use React.js, JavaScript, Node.js, Express, and MongoDB when developing my applications and I’m always curious about learning new skills, tools, and concepts. These days, I am working on relearning Python.
